author: gstein
msg: Switch dual-pool usage to standard ordering.
(read_node_version_info): swap order of the two pool params.
(read_one_tree_conflict): swap order of the two pool params. update

author: arfrever
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r36450, r36452, r37470, r37479 and 37538 and vote for some

author: gstein
msg: Revamp some of the walking code and some fetching of tree conflict
information. Introduce a new helper to look for nodes in the old "DELETED"
(visit_tc_too_found_entry): remove access baton handling, and use newer
db/abspath functions. use new svn_wc__db_check_node and
svn_wc__node_is_deleted to replace a couple entry-based tests.
(svn_wc__walk_entries_and_tc): remove some of the access baton handling,
use svn_wc__get_tree_conflict2, and init the new 'db' member in the
(revert_internal): take a DB handle and switch to get_tree_conflict2.
(svn_wc_resolved_conflict4): move the baton to the stack and initialize

author: arfrever
msg: * build/run_ctypesgen.sh: Add some comments and create necessary directories
